question: What is the most commonly used plasticizer in the world?
ground_truth: Among all phthalate esters, di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP) is the most commonly used plasticizer worldwide.
system_answer: The most commonly used plasticizer worldwide is Di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP), primarily due to its widespread application in PVC plastics. Its flexibility properties make it an ideal choice for various industries.
